meanings.definition: A style or arrangement of hair.
meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful hairdo for the party.
meanings.sent2: The hairdresser created a stunning hairdo for the bride.
meanings.sent3: His messy hairdo made him look like a wild animal.
meanings.sent4: Her hairdo was a work of art, like a sculpture on her head.
meanings.sent5: The hairdo was so intricate, it seemed like a masterpiece of hair design.

meanings.definition: The act of arranging or styling hair.
meanings.sent1: She is skilled in creating a perfect hairdo for any occasion.
meanings.sent2: The hairdo took hours to complete, but it was worth it.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at a new hairdo ended up looking like a disaster.
meanings.sent4: The hairdo was like a magic trick, transforming her appearance instantly.
meanings.sent5: The hairdo was so elegant, it seemed to defy gravity with its beauty.
